full_description:
GOVO GoKixx 621 ENC Bluetooth Wireless Neckband

The GOVO GoKixx 621 ENC Bluetooth Neckband can be swiftly recharged via its type C plug, allowing for up to 10 hours of playback with just a 10-minute charge. It offers an impressive 22-hour battery life, ensuring uninterrupted music listening. The device provides seamless connectivity for up to 30 feet by utilizing Bluetooth V5.2. By blocking out background noise, the Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) feature of the GOVO GoKixx 621 Bluetooth Neckband makes calls incredibly clear. The dedicated gaming mode, which lowers latency to less than 60 ms and offers lag-free gameplay, will be appreciated by gamers. The deep bass setting boosts the audio quality even further by maximizing the amount of powerful bass. Users may easily access Google and Siri voice assistants with just a click thanks to the GOVO Neckband's support for both services. Convenience is provided by smart magnetic buds that save battery life by automatically connecting and disconnecting the device when it is clipped and unclipped. The audio characteristics include an impedance of 16Ω ± 15%, a sensitivity of 105dB ± 3dB at 1kHz, and a frequency response range of 20Hz to 20kHz. The sensitivity of the built-in microphone is 42dB ± 3dB. The GOVO GoKixx 621 Bluetooth Neckband is compatible with Bluetooth profiles like A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, and HSP and has a transmission range of up to 10 meters. It has a 140mAh battery inside that can be fully charged in about 30 minutes and has a 140-hour standby period. The neckband is lightweight and strong enough for daily use, weighing only 29g and having IPX4 water resistance thanks to its sturdy PP+ABS construction.

Powerful 10mm Drivers

Experience rich bass and high-quality music thanks to the chipset and potent 10mm speakers. Experience smooth connectivity with Bluetooth V5.2 and a range of up to 30 feet with the GOVO GoKixx 621 Bluetooth Neckband. Environmental noise cancellation (ENC) guarantees crystal-clear calls, while the gaming mode removes all latency with less than 60 ms, allowing you to play your favorite mobile games uninterrupted.

Up to 22 Hours of Battery Life

With a 140mAh battery life that lasts up to 22 hours, the GOVO GoKixx 621 Bluetooth Neckband lets you stay connected all day. You may get up to 10 hours of playback out of your headphones by fast-charging them for just 10 minutes. To get the fullest bass from your music, switch to the deep bass mode. Alternatively, you can use your neckband to trigger your Google or Siri voice assistant with a simple click. With clever magnetic buds, you can quickly disconnect and reconnect them to your mobile device by clipping and unclipping the buds, which also saves battery life.
